missionDescription: At LegalSphere, our mission is to make legal information accessible to everyone in India. We believe that understanding the law is a fundamental right, and our platform is designed to bridge the gap between complex legal jargon and the common person.
privacyFirst: Privacy First: No Confidential Data Stored
privacyDescription: We are committed to your privacy. Your conversations are not stored, and any sensitive information you provide is not recorded. Our system is designed to be stateless to ensure your data remains your own.
sourcesDescription: Our AI is trained on a vast corpus of verified legal documents, including Indian case law, statutes, and official government publications. This ensures the information you receive is accurate, reliable, and up-to-date.
teamDescription: We are a passionate team of legal experts, engineers, and designers dedicated to making the law accessible.
